TopicTitle: Andrew's Stock submarine, tank, and misc craft showcase [KATEC]

Articles.Content:
- WILL REPAIR WHEN I GET HOME -




Mission Statement:
To remain on the bleeding edge of stock technological advances, I will continue to nurture the forum's best innovators and engineers. I am a design and engineering company with a focus on high performance crafts for the public sector, private enterprise, and national defense programs.

OLD OP - UNDER RENOVATION


Craft Showcase:

I-400
 

Spoiler

 


I-400

Based on the technologies developed for my U-boats, I built a dual hull submarine with armor and stable handling. It also has an armored hangar on the deck, along with a nice fuel load of 13,000 units and a cruising speed of 12.6 m/s at 40-200 meters depth.

She weighs about 700 tons and is almost 60 meters long. XD















The hull bottom is just more armor.


It can dive rather deep.

 

 

 

 

 

The Pompeii Class submarine. 484 parts 968.3 mT.

Spoiler

 

It holds 12 0.625m Timaeus AA/AS missile-torpedoes which are launched vertically with a launch assist system build in the missiles and 4 1.25m Volcan AA/AS missile-torpedoes with explosive warheads for extra tough targets. The sub itself is neutrally buoyant with missile bays closed and a bit (0.1 m/s terminal speed downwards) while full and most of the time while empty and a top speed of 10 m/s

Action groups:
1)open the top missile bays for the Timaeus missiles
2)open the bottom missile bays for the Volcan missiles
3)activate the engines

DOWNLOAD

Pics:

 

 

 

 

 

I will add vehicles as produced

 

Turtle Tank - A really old vehicle, ugly in retrospect

 

Spoiler

Introducing the AR, Advanced Russian, series of tanks. The predecessor to the T-14 Armata.

Instead, it turned into a weird IFV/light tank combat vehicle. I'll make a true armata replica later, as I now have the hull and bearing.

Thanks to panzer1b's suggestion, I studied his bearing and made my own. It's much more durable than my old bearings, and the new side armor is chobam armor.

It proves effective at defeating standard tank rounds.

I'm lowering the part count for the T-14 Armata.

Here's a download to it. I'm making an improved cannon and turret for the T-14 Armata. https://www.dropbox.com/s/x4okdcvbegi5zba/AR-1_5_2.craft?dl=0





Defeats normal tanks rounds.



It's speed is over 24 m/s, making it quite a fast tank. It also has extremely good acceleration and braking characteristics.





Meanwhile, in Ural Vagonzavod.

 

Spoiler

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYhyzJ7jdGE

KDX-III

 

Spoiler

 






https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3pPaqU7MB7E

 

 

In KSP, this ship displaces over 220 long tons, while my old Burke replica only displaced 120 tons. Did I mention the large flight deck?

 

Also, put to full throttle and SAS on before launching any missiles. When using the cruise missiles, press space after switching to them to remove boosters, and also correct orientation.

 

Also, enter the water at less than 10 m/s.

 

Numeral key 1 toggles the ship's main engines.

 

Disclaimer: The turret is not-operational atm, although it can fire the round. I'm still developing it.

 

 

The ship is armed with:

 

2X Brahmos missiles

 

8X AIM-56 VLS SAM's (Can be 20X, but that's an optional package. The rear VLS cells are empty unless you wish to fill them.)

 

1X MK-12 naval gun

 

1X Aegis Combat Suite

 

1X SPY-1D PAR Array

 

1X LIG Nex1 SLQ-200K Sonata EW Suite

 

7X GM LM1200 COGAG

 

 

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/uanfscluctke7po/KDX-3%20Block%20II.craft?dl=0

 

 

Next to my old Burke Class.

 

[imgur]WOlUb[/imgur]

 

 

The KDX-3 takes battle damage like a champ.

 

[imgur]fhG7Z[/imgur]

there is a new giant in town! the new B-52K (for KATEC obviously) its 860 parts and 85 tonnes(which is quite close to the OG) the plane's scale is 0.75 to the real one without bombs and the tail can come off during hard turns(it can also get into a spin over 2.5 g's) there are 4 guns that simulate shooting with engines and activated with 2 and 3 AGs the cargo bay opens and closes with the 1 key.




https://www.dropbox.com/s/hk3dok7s2cirwyk/B-52.craft?dl=0

 

 

Pics:

 

[imgur]gJd6F[/imgur]

E-9

 

Welll I've promised to get my new looker out the door ASAP and here it is! The E-9 is a new multirole plane designed as a combination between high speed high maneuverability and long endurance and long range with high capacity for armaments. The E-9 can carry 8-10 of the 0.625 AIM-56 (possibly more) and it has 2 sets of engines- 1 low altitude basic jets for sub-sonic low altitude long cruising ability another high advanced jets for high speed on high altitude for long range capabilities for high speed bombing and dogfighting runs you need to use both engines at the same time. With both engines it can turn at 10 G's and 7 G's with only one pair.

 

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2xxytp87e49vv8r/E-9.craft?dl=0

 

Pictures.

 

[imgur]FQn89[/imgur]

Super Hornet

 

I'm currently developing bunker buster missiles, so I'll release an armed version of this jet separately.

 

I also took some liberty on the accuracy of the replica itself to increase the performance of the craft.

 

Introducing, the Super Hornet!





 

 

It checks off almost all of the performance requirements.

 

 

It has four tanks per engine for a total internal fuel payload of 1200 units, along with a 46 unit external drop tank. That's well over twice the range of the F-15E I built... sorry, USAF.

 

 

The maneuverability is pretty awesome, too.

 

 

I'll be releasing the armed version with AIM-9X missiles and bunker buster guided munitions soon.

 

 

This version, the non bunker buster edition, is not equipped with weapon stations. It is easy to retrofit, however.

 

 

[imgur]QDDiR[/imgur]

Dreadnaught

Spoiler

 

 

download:

http://www./download/4cn3vcq0z4r145s/%27Victory%27+Class+Dreadnought.craft#39;Victory'_Class_Dreadnought.craft

 

200 tons and 530 parts, this behemoth is a mighty vessel. She is armed with 2 'Impaler' missiles and 12 I-Beams, she is built in an odd way, her armour shell is built first, then everything else is put on the inside, this makes her incredibly resilient.

 

She took part in The Battle of Laythe in which she was attacked and heavily damaged by an enemy frigate., but she pulled through, she chased her enemy and obliterated it bringing an end to the fight.

Heavy Frigate

 

download:

http://www./download/cbcwh2spil8m91f/%27Temeraire%27+Class+Heavy+Frigate.craft#39;Temeraire'_Class_Heavy_Frigate.craft

 

68 tons and 290 parts, this ship has two layers of armour, one slows down a projectile, the other stops it. She is armed with 8 I-beams, three can be fired in each broadside, and one impaler.

 

Two of these ships took part in The Battle of Laythe, one ship took three fighter attacks and was only put out of action by a design flaw which has since been fixed. The other ship ripped an enemy frigate in two.

Battlecruiser

 

download:

http://www./download/hxaed7h2nv10nej/%27Royal+Sovereign%27+Class+Battlecruiser.craft#39;Royal_Sovereign'_Class_Battlecruiser.craft

 

63 tons and 270 parts, this ship is partly double layered and takes some inspiration from Zekes' formidable 'Drek' type ships. She is armed with 6 I-beams and two standard SRB missiles.

 

Two of these ships took part in The Battle of Laythe in which both destroyed a frigate each and made up the first phase of my battle strategy.

EB-7 HellCarrier

 

Spoiler

download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q5j8jriibzp67w5/EB-7%20HellCarrier.craft?dl=0
[imgur]6iHhi[/imgur]

hello everyone at KATEC! After a long time of inactivity i have a treat for you- The EB-7 HellCarrier. it's a bomber plane filled with 16(yes 16!) AIM-56 Missiles also it's quite maneuverable at 6 G's when full and empty

 

E-5 Demon

 

Spoiler

 

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wid8k68r703ps1n/E-5%20Demon.craft?dl=0

 

[imgur]nhLnC[/imgur]

 

A very maneuverable craft that turns at 14-15 G's while not armed and 10+ G's while fully armed with 2 0.625 missiles. it's rather small and lands at very low speed of less than 20 m/s. it's designed as an air superiority craft that can take on much larger planes then himself.

 

 

 

 

 

E-5V Phoenix

 

Spoiler

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/obp1j3rd9xzs47w/E-5V%20Phoenix.craft?dl=0

It's and E-5 modified to have VTOL capabilities while sacrificing as little of the maneuverability as possible- As of that it turns at 13-14 G's while not armed and 10+ G's while fully armed with 2 0.625 missiles. the VTOL engine is strong enough to lift the craft at 50% throttle.

[imgur]BsuIO[/imgur]

 

E-6

 

Spoiler

 

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j2wcohm5jsgoe1l/E-6.craft?dl=0

 

[imgur]d24i9[/imgur]

 

The Third plane for this monster release is the E-6: It's built on the mindset of making an E-5 for general purpose missions so it carries twice as much ammunition inside an internal missile bay. It's capable of 11-12 G's while not armed and 9-10 G's when the missile bay is full.

 

 

 

 

 

E-8

 

Spoiler

 

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/vs4c2vongcy1ysp/E-8.craft?dl=0

 

[imgur]r0mTE[/imgur]

 

The Forth has some major changes in the E fighter line as it's not only not a fighter but not even manned. Ladies and gentleman i'm happy to present the new E line plane the E-8 (E-7 is a the bomber i released earlier also called EB-7): It's a surveillance drone meant for high duration missions but also capable of high speed reconnaissance.

 

It's flight ceiling is 35,000m and it's top speed is above 2000 m/s (although it's not recommended to go over 32 Km).

 

 

 

 

 

E-8A

 

Spoiler

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/34yf6wgq9yvqfot/E-A8.craft?dl=0

[imgur]BQBTm[/imgur]

The Last plane for today is a combat drone built upon our marvelous E-8 that was built by demand from our military branch. The E-8A: This plane holds the future of our unkerballed operations- it can carry at least 2 0.625 missiles (it comes equipped with 2) and by clever design it's as maneuverable than our E-5 Demon while loaded with 2 missiles and more maneuverable while empty at 15+ G's. It's a bit slow turning when at low speeds after take off. Speaking of take off it's TO and landing speeds are low enough to even land on carriers(although i didnt try that) at below 15 m/s.

 

Introducing, the USAF F-15E Strike Eagle!

For KATEC 

 

The Pompeii Class submarine. 484 parts 968.3 mT.
It holds 12 0.625m Timaeus AA/AS missile-torpedoes which are launched vertically with a launch assist system build in the missiles and 4 1.25m Volcan AA/AS missile-torpedoes with explosive warheads for extra tough targets. The sub itself is neutrally buoyant with missile bays closed and a bit (0.1 m/s terminal speed downwards) while full and most of the time while empty and a top speed of 10 m/s

Action groups:
1)open the top missile bays for the Timaeus missiles
2)open the bottom missile bays for the Volcan missiles
3)activate the engines

DOWNLOAD

Pics:

May I suggest BD Armory for your turrets? It will increase aesthetics and usability in general. Otherwise, very neat craft, I haven't experimented much with subs since the new update, but the buoyancy is much better.
